definition[0]: a law that forces people to stay indoors after a particular time at night, or the time people must be indoors
example[0]: The government imposed a night-time curfew throughout the country.
example[1]: The curfew was lifted  (=ended) on May 6th.
example[2]: The whole town was placed under curfew.
example[3]: Anyone found in the streets after curfew was shot.
definition[1]: the time, decided by a parent, by which a child must be home or asleep in the evening
